content.question: Which of the following could describe the appearance of the data in the semi-log plot?

choices.label: The data appear linear with a slope of <math alttext="5"><mn>5</mn></math>.
The data appear linear with a slope of <math alttext="ln 5"><mi>ln</mi><mn>5</mn></math>.
The data appear as an exponential curve that is concave up.
The data appear as an exponential curve that is concave down.

content.answer: The data appear linear with a slope of <math alttext="ln 5"><mi>ln</mi><mn>5</mn></math>.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
